name: MIS National HDC Eligibility Stats
description:
Displays key statsin relation to prisoners who are Eligble for HDC accross the prison estate. Information provided includes: Numbers Eligible for HDC, HDC dates have passed, HDC has passed with No Decision, Decision prior to HDCED, Approved, Opt Out, Postponed and Rejected
SEN0043 v00.00.01 Last Modified:15/03/2019

dataset.name: All Eligible
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_HDCED_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS TODAY_, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_DECISION_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DIM_DECISION_DATE.DAY_DATE END AS HDC_DECISION_DATE, AT_CURFEW_ASSESSMENT.CURFEW_SEQ, AT_DIM_HDC_ASST_APP_STATUS.HDC_ASSMENT_APP_STATUS_DESC, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_HDCED_NOOUTER.DAY_DATE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DECISION_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HDCED_NOOUTER, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.FACT_CURFEW_ASSESSMENT AT_CURFEW_ASSESSMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_HDC_ASSESSMNT_APP_STATUS AT_DIM_HDC_ASST_APP_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_CURR_SENT WHERE (AT_CURFEW_ASSESSMENT.HDC_ASSMENT_APP_STATUS_SK = AT_DIM_HDC_ASST_APP_STATUS.HDC_ASSMENT_APP_STATUS_SK (+)) AND (AT_CURFEW_ASSESSMENT.DECISION_DATE_SK = AT_DIM_DECISION_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_CURR_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_FACT_CURR_SENT.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_FACT_CURR_SENT.HDCED_DATE_SK = AT_HDCED_NOOUTER.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_CURFEW_ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) OR 'All' IN ((SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))) AND NOT FACT_CURR_KEY_DATES_SENT.CURR_HDCED_DATE IS NULL AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, CURR_HDCED_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, TODAY_, HDC_DECISION_DATE, CURFEW_SEQ, HDC_ASSMENT_APP_STATUS_DESC, AREA_DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ELIGBLE_NOMS, 'TBD' AS V_HDCED_PASSED, CASE WHEN COUNTDISTINCT((OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) OVER (PARTITION BY V_HDC_ELIGIBLE_NO_DECISION = 1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNTDISTINCT((OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) OVER (PARTITION BY V_HDC_ELIGIBLE_NO_DECISION = 1) END AS V_COUNT_HDC_ELIGIBLE_NO_DECI45, SUM(NaN) AS _, 'TBD' AS V_SUM_DECISION_BEFORE_HDCED, CASE WHEN COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_APPROVED_1 = 1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_APPROVED_1 = 1) END AS V_APPROVED_REPLACE_NULLS, CASE WHEN COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_OPTED_OUT = 1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_OPTED_OUT = 1) END AS V_COUNT_OPTED_OUT_REMOVE_NULLS, CASE WHEN COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_POSTPONE = 1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_POSTPONE = 1) END AS V_COUNT_POSTPONE_REMOVE_NULLS, CASE WHEN COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_REJECTED = 1) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_REJECTED = 1) END AS V_COUNT_REJECTED_REMOVE_NULLS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_HDCED_PASSED
field.legacySql: =Count(([NOMS Number] Where ([HDCED] < [Today (Date Only)]));Distinct) In ([v_MAX_HDC_Curfew_Seq]) ForEach ([Associated Establishment Name])
